content.question: (a) An observer of the rider on the unicycle correctly makes the following claim: “For the rider to maintain their balance, the rider’s center of mass must be located to the right of the point at which the wheel is in contact with the ground.” Using appropriate physical principles, justify this claim. Include qualitative reasoning beyond referencing equations in your answer.
